text:
The App Store has a full-fledged Photoshop for iPad
04 Nov 2019, 08:59 by Ilya Sidorov
Adobe released Photoshop for the iPad a year after the announcement.
The mobile application looks like a full-fledged Photoshop. In terms of capabilities, it also does not lag behind the desktop version. Adobe highlights five key features:
‚ñ™Ô∏è Full support for PSD‚ñ™Ô∏è LayersÔ∏è Retouching toolsÔ∏è CompositingÔ∏è Sync all files


Photoshop start screen.

Photoshop for iPad is included in the Adobe subscription. If you do not have it, the company offers a trial version for 30 days.
The application supports all Apple Pencil and the following tablets:
‚ñ™Ô∏è All models iPad ProductÔ∏è iPad mini 4‚ñ™Ô∏è iPad 5th generation (2017) ‚ñ™Ô∏è iPad Air 2
It requires iOS 13.1 or later to work.
The system requirements do not specify iPad Air 3, iPad mini 5, iPad 2018 and 2019. But, probably, Photoshop will also run on them. [iPhone Hacks]
